a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Primary energy consumption is measured in terawatt-hours (TWh). Here an inefficiency factor (the 'substitution'
method) has been applied for fossil fuels, meaning the shares by each energy source give a better approximation
Source: BP Statistical Review of World Energy
Note: 'Other renewables' includes geothermal, biomass and waste energy.
